source/crisscross/platform_detect.h

00001 /*
00002  *   CrissCross
00003  *   A multi-purpose cross-platform library.
00004  *
00005  *   A product of Uplink Laboratories.
00006  *
00007  *   (c) 2006-2007 Steven Noonan.
00008  *   Licensed under the New BSD License.
00009  *
00010  */
00011 
00012 /*
00013 
00014 Preprocessor Definitions
00015 ------------------------
00016 
00017 TARGET_CPU_X86
00018     x86 processor
00019 TARGET_CPU_X64
00020     64-bit processor
00021 TARGET_CPU_PPC
00022     PowerPC processor
00023 TARGET_CPU_ALPHA
00024     Alpha processor (not supported)
00025 
00026 TARGET_OS_WINDOWS
00027     Windows
00028 TARGET_OS_LINUX
00029     Linux
00030 TARGET_OS_MACOSX
00031     Mac OS X
00032 TARGET_OS_FREEBSD
00033     FreeBSD (not supported)
00034 TARGET_OS_NETBSD
00035     NetBSD (not supported)
00036 TARGET_OS_OPENBSD
00037     OpenBSD (not supported)
00038 
00039 TARGET_COMPILER_GCC
00040     GNU C++ Compiler
00041 TARGET_COMPILER_VC
00042     Visual C++
00043 TARGET_COMPILER_ICC
00044     Intel C++ Compiler
00045 
00046  */
00047 
00048 #ifndef __included_cc_platform_detect_h
00049 #define __included_cc_platform_detect_h
00050 
00051 #   undef PROCESSOR_DETECTED
00052 #   undef COMPILER_DETECTED
00053 #   undef OS_DETECTED
00054 
00055 /* ------------------- *
00056  * PROCESSOR DETECTION *
00057  * ------------------- */
00058 
00059 /* Carbon defines this for us on Mac, apparently... */
00060 #    if defined ( TARGET_CPU_PPC )
00061 #        define PROCESSOR_DETECTED
00062 #    endif
00063 
00064 /* PowerPC */
00065 #    if !defined ( PROCESSOR_DETECTED )
00066 #       if defined ( _ARCH_PPC ) || defined ( __ppc__ ) || defined ( __ppc64__ ) || defined ( __PPC ) || defined ( powerpc ) || defined ( __PPC__ ) || defined ( __powerpc64__ ) || defined ( __powerpc64 )
00067 #           define PROCESSOR_DETECTED
00068 #           if defined ( __ppc64__ ) || defined ( __powerpc64__ ) || defined ( __powerpc64 )
00069 #               define TARGET_CPU_PPC 64
00070 #           else
00071 #               define TARGET_CPU_PPC 32
00072 #           endif
00073 #       endif
00074 #   endif
00075 
00076 /* Intel x86 */
00077 #   if !defined ( PROCESSOR_DETECTED )
00078 #       if defined ( __i386__ ) || defined ( __i386 ) || defined ( i386 ) || defined ( _X86_ ) || defined ( _M_IX86 )
00079 #           define PROCESSOR_DETECTED
00080 #           define TARGET_CPU_X86
00081 #       endif
00082 #   endif
00083 
00084 /* x64/AMD64 */
00085 #    if !defined ( PROCESSOR_DETECTED )
00086 #       if defined ( __x86_64__ ) || defined ( __x86_64 ) || defined ( __amd64 ) || defined ( __amd64__ ) || defined ( _AMD64_ ) || defined ( _M_X64 )
00087 #           define PROCESSOR_DETECTED
00088 #           define TARGET_CPU_X64
00089 #       endif
00090 #   endif
00091 
00092 /* IA64 */
00093 #    if !defined ( PROCESSOR_DETECTED )
00094 #       if defined ( __ia64__ ) || defined ( _IA64 ) || defined ( __ia64 ) || defined ( _M_IA64 )
00095 #           define PROCESSOR_DETECTED
00096 #           define TARGET_CPU_IA64
00097 #       endif
00098 #   endif
00099 
00100 /* ------------------- *
00101  * COMPILER DETECTION  *
00102  * ------------------- */
00103 
00104 #   if !defined ( COMPILER_DETECTED )
00105 #       if defined ( __GNUC__ )
00106 #           define COMPILER_DETECTED
00107 #           define TARGET_COMPILER_GCC
00108 #       endif
00109 #       if defined ( __CYGWIN__ ) || defined ( __CYGWIN32__ )
00110 #           define TARGET_COMPILER_CYGWIN
00111 #       endif
00112 #   endif
00113 
00114 #   if !defined ( COMPILER_DETECTED )
00115 #       if defined ( __INTEL_COMPILER ) || defined ( __ICL )
00116 #           define COMPILER_DETECTED
00117 #           define TARGET_COMPILER_ICC
00118 #       endif
00119 #   endif
00120 
00121 #   if !defined ( COMPILER_DETECTED )
00122 #       if defined ( _MSC_VER )
00123 #           define COMPILER_DETECTED
00124 #           define TARGET_COMPILER_VC
00125 #       endif
00126 #   endif
00127 
00128 /* ------------ *
00129  * OS DETECTION *
00130  * ------------ */
00131 
00132 #   if !defined ( OS_DETECTED )
00133 #       if defined ( TARGET_COMPILER_VC ) || defined ( _WIN32 ) || defined ( _WIN64 )
00134 #           define OS_DETECTED
00135 #           define TARGET_OS_WINDOWS
00136 #       endif
00137 #   endif
00138 
00139 #   if !defined ( OS_DETECTED )
00140 #       if defined ( __linux__ ) || defined ( linux ) || defined ( __linux ) || defined ( __gnu_linux__ ) || defined ( __CYGWIN__ )
00141 #           define OS_DETECTED
00142 #           define TARGET_OS_LINUX
00143 #       endif
00144 #   endif
00145 
00146 #   if !defined ( OS_DETECTED )
00147 #       if defined (__FreeBSD__)
00148 #           define OS_DETECTED
00149 #           define TARGET_OS_FREEBSD
00150 #       endif
00151 #   endif
00152 
00153 #   if !defined ( OS_DETECTED )
00154 #       if defined (__NetBSD__)
00155 #           define OS_DETECTED
00156 #           define TARGET_OS_NETBSD
00157 #       endif
00158 #   endif
00159     
00160 #   if !defined ( OS_DETECTED )
00161 #       if defined (__OpenBSD__)
00162 #           define OS_DETECTED
00163 #           define TARGET_OS_OPENBSD
00164 #       endif
00165 #   endif
00166     
00167 #   if !defined ( OS_DETECTED )
00168 #       if defined (__APPLE__) || defined (__MACH__)
00169 #           define OS_DETECTED
00170 #           define TARGET_OS_MACOSX
00171 #       endif
00172 #   endif
00173 
00174 #    if defined(TARGET_CPU_IA64) || defined(TARGET_CPU_X64)
00175 #        define TARGET_CPU_BITS 64
00176 #    elif defined(TARGET_CPU_X86)
00177 #        define TARGET_CPU_BITS 32
00178 #    endif
00179 
00180 #    if defined(TARGET_CPU_PPC)
00181 #        if TARGET_CPU_PPC == 32
00182 #            define TARGET_CPU_BITS 32
00183 #        elif TARGET_CPU_PPC == 64
00184 #            define TARGET_CPU_BITS 64
00185 #        endif
00186 #    endif
00187 
00188 #   if !defined ( PROCESSOR_DETECTED )
00189 #       error "Could not detect target CPU."
00190 #   endif
00191 
00192 #   if !defined ( COMPILER_DETECTED )
00193 #       error "Could not detect target compiler."
00194 #   endif
00195 
00196 #   if !defined ( OS_DETECTED )
00197 #       error "Could not detect target OS."
00198 #   endif
00199 
00200 #   if !defined ( TARGET_CPU_BITS )
00201 #       error "Could not detect 32-bit/64-bit architecture."
00202 #   endif
00203 
00204 #endif
